wardance.command.setSkillfalse: %1$s can no longer equip or use %2$s
wardance.command.clearSkilltrue: %1$s can no longer equip or use any skills
wardance.command.clearSkillfalse: %1$s can now equip and use all skills
gamerule.lockWarSkills: 默认锁定技能（可用指令单个解锁）
wardance.tooltip.parry: 至多招架%s 次攻击且有%.2d 秒冷却
wardance.tooltip.resetStyle2: 左击显示流派信息。重置流派请先清空当前技能选项
wardance.tooltip.resetStyle3: 左击显示流派信息，右击重置流派和所有装备的技能
wardance.skill: 选择施放技能（仅限战斗模式）
wardance.bindCast: 施放绑定技能（仅限战斗模式）
wardance.skill.conflict: 当前在使用不兼容的技能
wardance.category.none.name: 所有技能
wardance.category.general.name: 通用
wardance.category.dominance.name: 霸者
wardance.category.dominance.desc: 十步杀一人，千里不留行
wardance.category.resolution.name: 守卫
wardance.category.subterfuge.name: 突袭
wardance.category.fervor.name: 连击
wardance.category.perception.name: 洞察
wardance.category.perception.desc: 全知之眼下的天罗地网
wardance.category.decay.name: 衰败
wardance.skill.mark.desc: 不可通过非指定手段驱散，可通过对准目标查看其当前所有标记。
wardance.skill.instant_cast.desc: 只需要将鼠标移到图标上即可施放
wardance.skill.holster_cast.desc: 需要在战斗模式下选定后执行特定行动
wardance.skill.bound_cast.desc: 需要在战斗模式下选定后按下施放键（默认鼠标中键）
wardance.skill.taken_damage.desc: 计算药水效果、护甲等减免前的伤害
wardance.skill.received_damage.desc: 计算药水效果、护甲等减免后的伤害
wardance.skill.enemies.desc: 正在攻击你的团队的生物，或你的团队正在攻击的生物。无防备的生物和攻击非盟友目标的生物不算作敌人
wardance.skill.allies.desc: 宠物、宠物主人、团队成员、pvp时包括所有玩家
wardance.skill.aux_attack.desc: 每%d秒使你的普攻追加一次攻击，造成%d伤害和%d架势伤害
wardance.skill.true_damage.desc: 不计算药水效果、护甲等减免效果
wardance.skill.recover.desc: 不计算治疗加成和禁疗
wardance.skill.heal.desc: 计算治疗加成和禁疗，不计算治疗加成
wardance.skill.silence.desc: 被沉默的目标无法叫喊和使用吟唱技能
wardance.skills_style:
在左边的名单里选择一个流派查看其核心技能，在右侧装备后解锁其他技能槽。
技能根据大致玩法拥有自己的颜色，有些流派会{限制可装备的技能颜色; YELLOW}。一般来说{限制较大; GOLD}的流派会拥有更加{强力的核心效果; GOLD}，而{限制较小; AQUA}的流派可能拥有{较弱效果; AQUA}甚至{负面效果; RED}。
wardance.skills_general:
选择左侧的技能查看其描述和副技能，选择副技能后点击右侧的{灰色技能槽; GRAY}将其装备进技能栏。右击技能槽清空该槽装备的技能。
技能描述可能包括颜色高亮，鼠标移动至{斜体; ITALIC, GOLD; 提供词条描述}和{横线; UNDERLINE, GOLD; 提供具体数据}字体可获得额外信息。
wardance.skill_soft_incompat: Cannot be cast with skills tagged as:
wardance.skill_hard_incompat: Cannot be equipped with skills tagged as:
wardance.sleight_of_hand.name: Sleight of Hand
wardance.sleight_of_hand.desc:
You may only equip {white, BOLD} skills. 
If a cast skill belongs to an archetype, it will randomly trigger the effects of another skill within the archetype instead.
wardance.survivor.name: 不灭
wardance.survivor.desc:
你只可以装备1个颜色。
{受到; ITALIC, GRAY; wardance.skill.received_damage.desc}致命伤害时会消耗2威进入不灭状态10秒。该状态下{无法恢复生命; RED}、{无法获得威; RED}、{免疫所有伤害; DARK_GREEN}。结束后根据该状态下的杀敌数目{恢复; DARK_GREEN, ITALIC; wardance.skill.recover.desc} {生命; DARK_GREEN, UNDERLINE; 10% for each entity, or all for a player}。
wardance.wind_scar.name: 风如刀割
wardance.wind_scar.desc:
你可以装备2个颜色。
攻击距离+1
近战和技能伤害根据你和目标的距离增加破甲，每1格距离无视15%护甲。
wardance.timberfall.name: 一木破天
wardance.timberfall.desc:
你可以装备2个颜色。
施放技能3秒内你的下一次普攻会造成40%额外架势和生命伤害，且算作技能伤害。
若该伤害破防目标，使其额外获得一个破绽。
wardance.frost_fang.name: 决堤之水
wardance.frost_fang.desc:
你可以装备2个颜色。
幸运+2
每4秒若没有攻击则获得20%额外伤害，最大100%。
攻击后2秒失去该加成。
wardance.flame_dance.name: 星火燎原
wardance.flame_dance.desc:
你可以装备2个颜色。
每5次攻击造成70%额外伤害并获得1灵。普攻和技能会标记敌人，最大50层。每层增加受到的伤害。
满威时改为引爆印记造成伤害，单次引爆的越多造成的伤害越高。
wardance.boulder_brace.name: 坚若磐石
wardance.boulder_brace.desc:
你可以装备2个颜色。
架势冷却速度+50%
没有移动时架势恢复+50%
被破防或击倒时自动消耗1威取消该次破防。
wardance.walk_of_dionysus.name: Walk of Dionysus
wardance.hopping_mad.name: Hopping Mad
wardance.hopping_mad.desc:
You may equip up to 3 colors. 
Your max posture is halved, but you recover half of lost posture after landing from a jump.
wardance.blood_tax.name: Blood Tax
wardance.blood_tax.desc:
You may equip up to 4 colors. 
All skills using spirit will instead consume half that amount in health.
wardance.unstable_spirit.name: Unstable Spirit
wardance.unstable_spirit.desc:
You may equip up to 4 colors. 
Upon casting a skill, create a non-griefing and indiscriminate explosion.
wardance.gamblers_whimsy.name: Gambler's Whimsy
wardance.gamblers_whimsy.desc:
You may equip up to 5 colors. 
Only one of your active skills is enabled. One more skill is enabled for every level of might you have. The list of enabled skills are randomly refreshed after every skill cast.
wardance.sifu.name: Sifu
wardance.sifu.desc: You may equip any skill that is not {purple, DARK_PURPLE, BOLD}.
archetype.heavy_blow.name: 重击
archetype.heavy_blow.desc:
{暴击; GOLD}可以破盾；若暴击被其他物品招架，束缚招架用的手1.5秒。
三次攻击后冷却。
「重击」和目标的「不动」会相互抵消。
wardance.vital_strike.name: 会心一击
wardance.silencer.name: 窒息
wardance.silencer.desc:
攻击无防备目标时暴击、束缚目标双手、并{沉默; ITALIC, GRAY; wardance.skill.silence.desc}该目标。
五次攻击后冷却，若击杀被沉默的目标则立刻刷新。
wardance.poise.name: Poise
wardance.stagger.name: 威压
wardance.stagger.desc:
{暴击; GOLD}：
束缚目标双手1.5秒
暴击不造成额外伤害但架势伤害受到双倍加成
三次攻击后冷却。
「威压」和目标的「不动」会相互抵消。
wardance.leverage.name: 扭矩
wardance.leverage.desc: 暴击伤害根据你和目标的距离改变，最多300%。
wardance.momentum.name: 惯性
wardance.momentum.desc: 无法自然暴击。每（8-评分）次攻击{自动暴击;GOLD}。暴击伤害+0.5%，架势伤害+0.01，每级评分效果{翻倍;GOLD}。
archetype.iron_guard.name: 不动
archetype.iron_guard.desc:
招架获得额外效果。4秒后冷却。
「不动」和攻击者的「重击」会相互抵消。
wardance.return_to_sender.name: 回敬
wardance.return_to_sender.desc: 招架抛射物时消耗50%额外架势将其反弹回攻击者的方向。
wardance.afterimage.name: 残影
wardance.afterimage.desc: 潜行招架近战攻击时{致盲;GRAY}（架势伤害）范围内的{敌人; ITALIC; wardance.skill.enemies.desc}，然后隐身1秒。10秒冷却。
wardance.backpedal.name: 卸力
wardance.backpedal.desc: 空中招架时伤害转换为{击退;AQUA}。4秒冷却。
wardance.mikiri.name: 见切
wardance.mikiri.desc: {招架免费;DARK_GREEN}。7秒后冷却，每次攻击和招架减少一秒。
wardance.overpower.name: 反击
wardance.overpower.desc:
反弹架势伤害并用招架物品对目标造成一次架势伤害。
需要架势回满才能完全冷却。
wardance.recovery.name: 恢复
wardance.recovery.desc: 架势低于25%时招架不会暂停架势恢复。
archetype.coup_de_grace.name: 斩杀
archetype.coup_de_grace.desc:
开启后对看破目标造成其已损失生命20%的{真实伤害; ITALIC,RED; wardance.skill.true_damage.desc}并立刻结束其看破状态。
若目标可被该技能击杀（有标记提示），则所有对其造成的伤害转换为等量的架势伤害。
再次释放可关闭此技能。
释放3个其他技能后冷却，需要2威。
wardance.decapitate.name: 斩首
wardance.decapitate.desc: 若斩杀成功则{必定掉落目标的头;GOLD}，若没有头则+3{抢夺等级;GOLD}。
wardance.rupture.name: Rupture
wardance.rupture.desc:
Drain half of the target's spirit to create a large explosion. The size of the explosion increases with the target's max posture, and its damage increases with the target's spirit.
[stats]
Explosion radius: sqrt(max posture)
Explosion damage: (spirit before drain) *2
wardance.reinvigorate.name: 败者食尘
wardance.reinvigorate.desc: 被动。破防目标时对其造成1点{真实伤害; ITALIC,RED; wardance.skill.true_damage.desc}，每破防一次该目标伤害翻倍。
wardance.reaping.name: 收割
wardance.reaping.desc:
{绑定技能; ITALIC; wardance.skill.bound_cast.desc}：
开启后下次普攻会使所有周围的目标进入警惕状态，然后进行一次无法抵挡的攻击，造成（10%最大生命）+（攻击伤害）伤害。
低于该生命的目标将受到{真实伤害; ITALIC,RED; wardance.skill.true_damage.desc}。若击杀任何目标则{立刻刷新; DARK_GREEN}此技能，否则进入6个技能的冷却。
wardance.frenzy.name: 狂怒
wardance.frenzy.desc: 触发后刷新所有物理技能。
wardance.danse_macabre.name: 死亡之舞
wardance.danse_macabre.desc: 已损失生命百分比伤害根据评分提高到最多40%。
archetype.kick.name: 飞踢
archetype.kick.desc:
{绑定技能; ITALIC; wardance.skill.bound_cast.desc}。
对3方块内的目标造成4点架势伤害和2点掉落伤害。
4次攻击后冷却，需要1灵。
wardance.trample.name: 践踏
wardance.trample.desc: 若增加{2架势;GRAY}可以破防目标，则增加2架势伤害并将破防升级为{击倒; GRAY}。
wardance.shadowless_kick.name: 无影脚
wardance.shadowless_kick.desc:
{绑定技能; ITALIC; wardance.skill.bound_cast.desc}。
施放后每0.25秒飞踢一次，对3方块内的目标造成2架势伤害，1掉落伤害和较小的击退。
该效果最多{重复;GOLD}7次，若无法选定目标则直接结束。
6次攻击后冷却，需要2灵。
wardance.tackle.name: 冲撞
wardance.tackle.desc: +2距离并向前轻微突进，半秒内{免疫;DARK_GREEN}所有伤害。
wardance.tornado.name: 扫堂腿
wardance.tornado.desc: 飞踢所有范围内的目标。
wardance.sabaton_smash.name: 霸王脱鞋
wardance.sabaton_smash.desc: 消耗1架势大幅度击退目标，若目标{撞上墙体;AQUA}则额外造成（护甲/4）的掉落和架势伤害。
wardance.backflip.name: 后空翻
wardance.backflip.desc: 后退并{治疗; ITALIC, DARK_GREEN; wardance.skill.heal.desc}30%已损失架势，获得0.4评分。
archetype.grapple.name: 擒拿
archetype.grapple.desc:
{预备技能; ITALIC; wardance.skill.holster_cast.desc}。对同一目标进行两次空手攻击后造成7点真实架势伤害。
该技能若破防目标，将该次破防升级为{击倒; GRAY}。
7次攻击后冷却，消耗2灵。
wardance.throw.name: 投掷
wardance.throw.desc:
若成功击倒目标则举起目标并刷新此技能，持续至击倒结束为止。
{绑定技能; ITALIC; wardance.skill.bound_cast.desc}：若有生物骑着你，将其向视线方向投掷。若其{撞墙;GOLD}则造成3掉落伤害和7架势伤害。
wardance.suplex.name: 过肩摔
wardance.submission.name: 降伏
wardance.submission.desc: 额外从目标汲取{架势; UNDERLINE; 等于25%当前护甲}。若目标被破防则返还1灵。
wardance.cursed_palms.name: 替罪
wardance.cursed_palms.desc: 额外将自身一个{负面效果;LIGHT_PURPLE}转移至目标身上。
wardance.wrestle.name: 强人锁男
wardance.wrestle.desc:
{绑定技能; ITALIC; wardance.skill.bound_cast.desc}。双手均为空手消耗1威和2灵使一个范围3内的目标获得10层{标记; ITALIC; wardance.skill.mark.desc}。被{标记; ITALIC; wardance.skill.mark.desc}的目标{攻速;GOLD}-30%、{受到架势伤害;GOLD}+20%、试图逃脱时会被{拉向施加者;GOLD}、且所有{破防升级为击倒;GOLD}。
{同时你的移动速度减半。; RED}
对目标造成伤害或目标造成伤害时印记层数-1，若成功对印记施加者造成伤害则{印记层数-3;RED}。
{印记; ITALIC; wardance.skill.mark.desc}层数为0时、或10秒经过后、或施加者不再空手时自动结束，之后进入10秒冷却。
archetype.shield_bash.name: 盾击
archetype.shield_bash.desc:
{预备技能; ITALIC; wardance.skill.holster_cast.desc}。你的下一次盾牌攻击附带额外效果
7次招架后冷却，需要1灵。
wardance.pummel.name: 剑盾
wardance.pummel.desc: 被动。副手持盾时获得获得一个{6/0/盾牌架势伤害的附属攻击; ITALIC, UNDERLINE; wardance.skill.aux_attack.desc;6,0,盾牌架势伤害}。
wardance.rim_punch.name: 猛冲
wardance.rim_punch.desc: 不造成额外架势伤害，改为根据屏障击退目标并附带3秒反胃。
wardance.overbear.name: 泰山压顶
wardance.foot_slam.name: 碾压
wardance.foot_slam.desc: 攻击目标的腿部，使其获得（架势伤害*2）秒的缓慢和{混乱; ITALIC; 攻击混乱目标时获得分心伤害加成}。
wardance.berserk.name: 狂战
wardance.berserk.desc: 释放和攻击后刷新双手冷却且（架势伤害*2）秒内增加30%攻速。
wardance.lockdown.name: 封锁
wardance.lockdown.desc: 不造成额外架势伤害，改为{束缚;DARK_GREEN}目标双手（屏障冷却/2）秒。
archetype.feint.name: 佯攻
archetype.feint.desc:
{预备技能; ITALIC; wardance.skill.holster_cast.desc}。下一次攻击返还一半冷却、{束缚;DARK_GREEN}目标双手1秒并{标记; ITALIC; wardance.skill.mark.desc}6层。
施放时目标每层{标记; ITALIC; wardance.skill.mark.desc}{减少; RED}0.1秒束缚时间。每次对目标普攻减少一层标记。
3次攻击后冷却，需要4灵。
wardance.followup.name: 燕反
wardance.followup.desc: 返还所有冷却。被动：攻击双手被束缚的目标时返还一半冷却。
wardance.upper_hand.name: 过河拆桥
wardance.upper_hand.desc: 治疗等量的架势。减少目标2护甲10秒，获得等量护甲。最多获得20护甲。
wardance.smirking_shadow.name: 掠影
wardance.smirking_shadow.desc: 生效期间目标被视为{无防备;GRAY}。
wardance.scorpion_sting.name: 蛇蝎之心
wardance.scorpion_sting.desc: 添加10秒中毒，然后使目标所有负面效果的强度增加1。
wardance.spirit_resonance.name: 灵力回响
wardance.spirit_resonance.desc:
{标记; ITALIC; wardance.skill.mark.desc}的目标受到的{技能伤害; GOLD}+2，且技能伤害会额外移除一层标记
该效果有1秒内置冷却。
wardance.capricious_strike.name: Capricious Strike
wardance.capricious_strike.desc: Attacking a {marked; ITALIC; wardance.skill.mark.desc} target reduces cooldown all other physical skills by 1.
archetype.prowess.name: 马太效应
wardance.crown_champion.name: Crown Champion
wardance.crown_champion.desc: Gain 5% extra attack damage per level of might; your might gain is increased by 50%, decreasing by 5% per level of might.
wardance.vengeful_might.name: 不共戴天
wardance.vengeful_might.desc: 自己或10方块内的盟友受到伤害时{标记; ITALIC; wardance.skill.mark.desc}攻击者等同于{减免后; ITALIC; wardance.skill.received_damage.desc}伤害的层数并使其发光。对有标记的目标造成伤害时消耗标记层数造成最多两倍伤害并获得等量的威。
wardance.prideful_might.name: 盛气凌人
wardance.prideful_might.desc: 获得{3倍的威;GOLD}但{受到伤害;RED;wardance.skill.received_damage.desc}时清空所有威。每获得2层威，{偏转;GOLD}会立刻冷却。
wardance.hidden_might.name: Hidden Might
wardance.hidden_might.desc: Gain 0.25 might from an unaware attack. The distance at which you are detected is reduced by 30%; for every level of might you gain, 3% of this detection is converted to speed.
wardance.elemental_might.name: Elemental Might
wardance.elemental_might.desc: Attacking a target causes it to take (might/3) more damage from non-physical sources for the next 5 seconds; gain 1 might when an entity in 5 blocks dies from non-physical damage.
wardance.masters_might.name: Master's Might
wardance.masters_might.desc: When attacking a target without knockback immunity, slow others nearby for half a second and render the hit target immune to knockback for 5 seconds, gaining 1 might. Cannot attack stunned targets, but greatly knocks back on stun ignoring immunity. Upon dealing fatal damage, cancel the damage and stun the target for 6 seconds instead. After recovering, the target will run away, dropping triple the normal exp and no loot.
archetype.judgment.name: Judgment
wardance.amputation.name: Amputation
wardance.brutalize.name: Brutalize
wardance.brutalize.desc: Might cost per cast increased to 5. Intimidate hostile targets in a 10 block radius on every cast, causing them to take 20% more posture damage from you for 10 seconds. Successfully judging a target stuns it for double the usual time, nearby enemies with less health than the judged target are compelled to flee in fear.
wardance.viral_decay.name: 爆炸病毒
wardance.viral_decay.desc:
{标记; DARK_PURPLE, ITALIC; wardance.skill.mark.desc}一个可以触及的目标，每秒造成{真实伤害; GRAY, UNDERLINE; 等同于层数}。
目标死亡或被引爆时对半径3方块内的非{友方; AQUA, ITALIC; wardance.skill.allies.desc}单位造成2点{真实伤害; RED; wardance.skill.true_damage.desc}，并添加一层{标记; DARK_PURPLE, ITALIC; wardance.skill.mark.desc}。
消耗2威。
wardance.fever_dream.name: Fever Dream
wardance.fever_dream.desc: Upon successfully judging a target, compel entities in a 7 block radius to attack each other randomly. If this affects another {marked; ITALIC; wardance.skill.mark.desc} entity, they will repeat this effect. The effect can be chained up to 3 times.
wardance.lichtenberg_scar.name: Lichtenberg Scar
wardance.lichtenberg_scar.desc: Each cast deals no extra damage but only costs 1 might and 1 second of cooldown. Successfully judging a target deals 20% current health electric damage and summons lightning above all other {marked; ITALIC; wardance.skill.mark.desc} targets in a 30 block radius, dealing 10% current health as electric damage.
wardance.combo_breaker.name: Combo Breaker
wardance.combo_breaker.desc: Can only be cast once per 10 seconds. The {mark; ITALIC; wardance.skill.mark.desc} is also refreshed by casting skills on the target, and lasts 5 seconds regardless of stack. When the mark expires or you cast over 10 skills on the target, deal (4*skills cast on target)% current health damage.
archetype.memento_mori.name: 视死如归
wardance.bloodlust.name: Bloodlust
wardance.bloodlust.desc: For every 1% health lost, you gain 2% extra might and 1% extra damage.
wardance.rapid_clotting.name: 血甲
wardance.rapid_clotting.desc: 获得（已损失生命比率*20）的护甲。
wardance.shadow_dive.name: 影遁
wardance.shadow_dive.desc:
{受到; ITALIC; wardance.skill.received_damage.desc}超过当前生命25%的伤害时将该伤害降至当前生命的25%，然后进入8秒影遁状态，获得{隐身和速度;AQUA}。
影遁状态下第一个触碰或攻击的生物会代替你你成为其他敌人的攻击目标。
生命为满时冷却。
wardance.necrosis.name: 外强中干
wardance.necrosis.desc:
根据评分{增加; UNDERLINE; 每层评分+14%}最大生命。
{你的当前生命不会超过你真正的最大生命; RED}
wardance.static_discharge.name: 静电
wardance.static_discharge.desc: {受到; ITALIC; wardance.skill.received_damage.desc}伤害时蓄电，最多（最大生命/5）。攻击时消耗电量对5方块内的敌人造成等量的{电击;AQUA}伤害和击退。
wardance.pound_of_flesh.name: 以牙还牙
wardance.pound_of_flesh.desc: {瞬发技能; ITALIC; wardance.skill.holster_cast.desc}，消耗所有灵。攻击时{消耗自身10%最大生命;RED}，若目标招架该次攻击则额外造成其15%{最大架势;GOLD}的架势伤害，否则造成其{最大生命;GOLD}7%的伤害。灵恢复至最大值或（消耗的灵*4）秒后结束状态。
archetype.descend.name: Descend
wardance.fatal_falls.name: Fatal Falls
wardance.fatal_falls.desc: Additionally deals (fall distance) falling block damage.
wardance.fatal_falls.requirement: requires 5 spirit and must be grounded
wardance.hawk_dive.name: Phantom Dive
wardance.hawk_dive.desc: Can be cast while airborne. Every 7 blocks fallen upgrades the attack's ambush tier (alert->distracted->unaware); every upgrade beyond unaware paralyzes the target for for 3 seconds.
wardance.lights_out.name: Lights Out
wardance.lights_out.desc: If the target is staggered by this attack, it will be blinded and stagger time will be lengthened to 10 seconds, but stagger count will be set to 1.
wardance.lights_out.requirement: requires 5 spirit and must be grounded
wardance.shockwave.name: Shockwave
wardance.shockwave.desc: No effects on attack. Landing will create a shockwave that throws all entities within 5 blocks upwards slightly, deals (fall distance/2) posture damage and 1 falling block damage, and slows their posture regeneration by 40% for 2 seconds after posture cooldown has elapsed, negating fall damage.
wardance.shockwave.requirement: requires 5 spirit and must be grounded
wardance.titanfall.name: Titanfall
wardance.titanfall.desc: Consumes all of your own posture and deal it as additional damage to the target, increased by 4% per armor point you have.
wardance.titanfall.requirement: requires 5 spirit and must be grounded
archetype.hex.name: 诅咒
archetype.hex.desc: {绑定技能; ITALIC; wardance.skill.bound_cast.desc}。{标记; ITALIC; wardance.skill.mark.desc}一个可被触及的目标。需要1灵，15秒后冷却。
wardance.curse_of_misfortune.name: 厄运咒
wardance.curse_of_misfortune.desc:
使目标的{幸运; AQUA}降低2。
当你幸运{判定失败; AQUA}时，使下一次「厄运咒」的效果+1，最多可使目标幸运-13。
wardance.curse_of_echoes.name: 回音咒
wardance.curse_of_echoes.desc: 8秒内目标受到物理伤害时，额外对其造成40%的{真实伤害; ITALIC, RED; wardance.skill.true_damage.desc}，该效果有1秒内置冷却。
wardance.itchy_curse.name: 干癣咒
wardance.itchy_curse.desc:
使目标瘙痒3秒，该效果只有在静止不动时会减少时长。
每三秒，目标会{丧失行动能力;DARK_GREEN}1秒，且双手会被{束缚;DARK_GREEN}。
wardance.gangrene.name: Gangrene
wardance.gangrene.desc: For the next 8 seconds, the target loses the ability to heal for 2 seconds after taking non-physical damage.
wardance.unravel.name: 散魔咒
wardance.unravel.desc: 引爆目标所有能被牛奶{驱散;GOLD}的效果，使他们减少一层强度。{爆炸;GOLD}大小为7方块半径，造成6伤害。
wardance.black_mark.name: Black Mark
wardance.black_mark.desc: Saps the target of its vitality. For 10 seconds, any creature that deals melee damage to the target will heal for 1/3 the damage dealt and drain either 2 posture or 3 spirit, whichever the attacker has less of, and recover half that amount.
wardance.petrify.name: 石化咒
wardance.petrify.desc:
5秒内使目标减速30%，然后将其{石化;GRAY}3秒。
石化的生物被视为{无防备;GRAY}，但增加7护甲。
被动：对石化目标造成伤害时产生一次石粉爆炸，对目标7方块内的非友方目标造成5架势伤害和衰弱。
archetype.morale.name: 士气
archetype.morale.desc: 达成特定要求时恢复灵。
wardance.back_and_forth.name: Back and Forth
wardance.archers_paradox.name: 箭在弦上
wardance.archers_paradox.desc:
攻击{非警惕;AQUA}目标或{抛射物;AQUA}击中目标时恢复1灵。
该效果有3秒的冷却。
wardance.confidence.name: Confidence
wardance.confidence.desc: The more spirit you have, the faster your spirit regeneration, to a limit of 200% speed at max spirit and 50% speed at none.
wardance.natural_sprinter.name: 一鼓作气
wardance.natural_sprinter.desc:
最大灵{翻倍;GOLD}，灵恢复速度为正常的1/3。
{击杀;GOLD}目标时恢复3灵。
wardance.speed_demon.name: Speed Demon
wardance.speed_demon.desc: Halve spirit cooldown on a dodge and regain spirit on attack based on speed. The faster you are compared to your target, the more spirit is regenerated, capped at 1.
wardance.lady_luck.name: 流局满贯
wardance.lady_luck.desc: 释放技能时有（1+幸运）/（5+幸运）{概率;GREEN}（最低20%）{不消耗灵;GREEN}，概率{叠加;GREEN}到触发为止。
